originalText.text:
Zero customer service. Poorly trained call center agents.
I decided to close my account today. They frequently hang up if the call gets too complicated. Long hold times. Always fun when on a mission abroad. Never again.

text.text:
Zero customer service. Poorly trained call center agents.
I decided to close my account today. They frequently hang up if the call gets too complicated. Long hold times. Always fun when on a mission abroad. Never again.

originalText.text: One of the worst client service in banks anywhere. No one picks up the phone, no one in the chats, days to answer an email. Forget about having an urgent need for a financial service, when even regular services like a simple bank transfer takes a lot of effort to get it done!!

text.text: One of the worst client service in banks anywhere. No one picks up the phone, no one in the chats, days to answer an email. Forget about having an urgent need for a financial service, when even regular services like a simple bank transfer takes a lot of effort to get it done!!

originalText.text: serving the people who serve the world? your customer service is terrible. I'm not near a UNFCU branch and it can get difficult to get clear information from customer service after 2 hours of being on hold. A rep told me to deposit my 10K+ check via mobile deposit which you can't deposit more than 10K. I mailed the cheque and its taking forever for it to clear.

text.text: serving the people who serve the world? your customer service is terrible. I'm not near a UNFCU branch and it can get difficult to get clear information from customer service after 2 hours of being on hold. A rep told me to deposit my 10K+ check via mobile deposit which you can't deposit more than 10K. I mailed the cheque and its taking forever for it to clear.

originalText.text: I’m so glad others feel this way about UNFCU because I thought it was just me. I’ve probably called about a total of 20-30 times and every time I’ve called about my account, I’m being told something different about my account details, my access to it, and what i can and cannot do! I actually just called about an hour ago and I was dealing with someone who spoke over me every time I would talk. I kept my composure, but before I could say goodbye she hung up on me when she was the only person giving anyone an attitude while I was giving grace. I can’t wait to take all my money out of this account and place it somewhere else! I’ve never had such horrible customer service with a bank before and you’d imagine a credit union for something as big as the United Nations would be more put together! These employees really have no clue what they’re doing! Even the really nice ones unfortunately!

originalText.text: Fast and friendly service - took less than 5 minutes to deposit a check from sale of our car.
